name: BibleGateway Dark Theme 1.1
description:
Dark color set for BibleGateway designed to be easier on the eyes while reading
* Version 1.1 - removed right sidebar links
additional_info: There are some issues affecting certain paragraphs in translations that have many paragraphs per chapter such as the King James Version where the text remains black. If the chapter has under 60 verses however it should be fine.
